3. to tell; to notify
xiǎoshì /xiao3 shi4/*
xiǎoshìle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

Xiǎo Qiáng /Xiao3 Qiang2/
■ (slang) cockroach ("Little Qiang" was originally the name given to a dead cockroach that had supposedly been a pet of the lead character in the 1993 Hong Kong comedy movie "Flirting Scholar". Subsequently, it came to be used as a name for any cockroach, and also for characters in film and television who are seemingly indestructible or repeatedly resurrected.)

xià /xia4/
1. down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down; to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc); measure word to show the frequency of an action
2. to frighten; to scare
3. summer
4. crack; grudge
xià /xia4/
xiàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down; to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc); measure word to show the frequency of an action
2. to frighten; to scare
3. summer
4. crack; grudge
xià /xia4/
xiàguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down; to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc); measure word to show the frequency of an action
2. to frighten; to scare
3. summer
4. crack; grudge
xià /xia4/
xiàle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down; to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc); measure word to show the frequency of an action
2. to frighten; to scare
3. summer
4. crack; grudge
Xià /Xia4/
1. the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC; Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432); surname Xia
2. abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy »Xiàmén«, Fujian
xiàba /xia4ba5/
■ chin
xiàbakē /xia4 ba5 ke1/*
■ chin
xiàbān /xia4ban1/
■ to finish work; to get off work; next service (train, bus, etc)
xiàbān /xia4ban1/
xiàbānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to finish work; to get off work; next service (train, bus, etc)
xiàbān /xia4ban1/
xiàbānguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to finish work; to get off work; next service (train, bus, etc)
xiàbān /xia4ban1/
xiàbānle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to finish work; to get off work; next service (train, bus, etc)

5. pitfall; trap; to get stuck; to sink; to cave in; to frame (false charge); to capture (a city in battle); to fall (to the enemy); defect

7. county

9. filling; stuffing (for dumplings, pies etc)

xiàng /xiang4/

2. towards; to face; to turn towards; direction; to support; to side with; shortly before; formerly; always; all along; (suffix) suitable for ...; oriented to ...
3. to tend toward; to guide
4. direction; orientation; to face; to turn toward; to; towards; shortly before; formerly
5. back of neck; item; thing; term (in a mathematical formula); sum (of money); classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
6. elephant; CL: zhī
7. shape; form; appearance; to imitate
8. appearance; portrait; picture; government minister; (physics) phase; (literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features); to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
9. lane; alley
10. oak; Quercus serrata
11. a kind of jade
12. silkworm

Xià Huánggōng /Xia4 Huang2 gong1/*
■ Xia Huanggong also known as Huang Shigong »Huáng Shígōng« (dates of birth and death uncertain), Daoist hermit of the Qin Dynasty »Qíndài« and purported author of "Three Strategies of Huang Shigong" »Huáng Shígōng Sānlüè«, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China »Wǔjīng Qīshū«

xiē /xie1/
1. classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
2. to rest; to take a break; to stop; to halt; (dialect) to sleep; a moment; a short while
3. (bound form) scorpion
4. wedge; to hammer in
5. to hammer in (a nail); to drive (a wedge)
6. saline pond
7. short-snout dog
8. short garments
xiē /xie1/
xiēzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
2. to rest; to take a break; to stop; to halt; (dialect) to sleep; a moment; a short while
3. (bound form) scorpion
4. wedge; to hammer in
5. to hammer in (a nail); to drive (a wedge)

7. short-snout dog
8. short garments
xiē /xie1/
xiēguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. to rest; to take a break; to stop; to halt; (dialect) to sleep; a moment; a short while
3. (bound form) scorpion
4. wedge; to hammer in
5. to hammer in (a nail); to drive (a wedge)
6. saline pond
7. short-snout dog
8. short garments
xiē /xie1/
xiēle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

xié /xie2/
1. shoe; CL: shuāng, zhī
2. head
3. to be in harmony
4. demonic; iniquitous; nefarious; evil; unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine); (coll.) strange; abnormal
5. to carry; to take along; to bring along; to hold (hands); also pr. »xī«
6. inclined; slanting; oblique; tilting
7. to cooperate; to harmonize; to help; to assist; to join
8. in company with
9. flank (the side of one's torso); to coerce; to threaten
10. (bound form) harmonious; (bound form) humorous; (literary) to reach agreement
11. (bound form) to clasp under the arm; (bound form) to coerce; (bound form) to harbor (resentment etc); Taiwan pr. »xiá«
12. knot; tie a knot
13. to collect; Taiwan pr. »jié«
14. (of a bird) to fly upwards; (of the neck) stiff
15. (precise meaning unknown, relates to iron)
16. to cooperate; combined labor
17. harmonious
18. (meaning uncertain)
19. marking line; pure; to regulate
20. carry with the front of a robe
21. to harmonize; to accord with; to agree

xiè /xie4/
1. to thank; (bound form) to apologize; (bound form) to decline; to refuse; (bound form) (of flowers, leaves etc) to wither
2. acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)
3. to unload; to unhitch; to remove or strip; to get rid of
4. bits; fragments; crumbs; filings; trifling; trivial; to condescend to
5. crab
6. (bound form) to leak out; to discharge; (fig.) to divulge
7. to flow out swiftly; to flood; a torrent; diarrhea; laxative
8. obscene; disrespectful
9. appliance; tool; weapon; shackles; also pr. »jiè«
10. pavilion
11. lax; negligent
12. used in old names; phonetic seol used in Korean names
13. to blend; to adjust; to harmonize; harmony
14. contract
15. to lust for
16. wooden shoes
17. mountain valley
18. office
19. to get rid of; to discharge; to dredge
20. (of porridge etc) to become watery; (dialect) to thin (porridge etc) by adding water etc
21. mist; vapor
22. (literary) candle stub
23. dysentery
24. to bless
25. to tie; to bind; to hold on a leash; rope; cord
26. to tie; to bind
27. Allium bakeri; shallot; scallion
28. to walk
29. to limp
30. thunderous beating of drums
31. joint of bones

xiū /xiu1/
1. to decorate; to embellish; to repair; to build; to write; to cultivate; to study; to take (a class)
2. to rest; to stop doing sth for a period of time; to cease; (imperative) don't
3. shy; ashamed; shame; bashful; delicacies
4. call out; jeer
5. delicacies
6. protection; shade
7. dried meat presented by pupils to their teacher at their first meeting (in ancient times); dried; withered
8. to weed; to eradicate
9. see »píxiū«, composite mythical animal (originally was the female)
10. red lacquer; to lacquer
xiū /xiu1/
xiūzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to decorate; to embellish; to repair; to build; to write; to cultivate; to study; to take (a class)
2. to rest; to stop doing sth for a period of time; to cease; (imperative) don't
3. shy; ashamed; shame; bashful; delicacies
4. call out; jeer
5. delicacies
6. protection; shade
7. dried meat presented by pupils to their teacher at their first meeting (in ancient times); dried; withered
8. to weed; to eradicate
9. see »píxiū«, composite mythical animal (originally was the female)
10. red lacquer; to lacquer
xiū /xiu1/
xiūguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to decorate; to embellish; to repair; to build; to write; to cultivate; to study; to take (a class)
2. to rest; to stop doing sth for a period of time; to cease; (imperative) don't
3. shy; ashamed; shame; bashful; delicacies
4. call out; jeer
5. delicacies
6. protection; shade
7. dried meat presented by pupils to their teacher at their first meeting (in ancient times); dried; withered
8. to weed; to eradicate
9. see »píxiū«, composite mythical animal (originally was the female)
10. red lacquer; to lacquer
xiū /xiu1/
xiūle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to decorate; to embellish; to repair; to build; to write; to cultivate; to study; to take (a class)
2. to rest; to stop doing sth for a period of time; to cease; (imperative) don't
3. shy; ashamed; shame; bashful; delicacies
4. call out; jeer
5. delicacies
6. protection; shade
7. dried meat presented by pupils to their teacher at their first meeting (in ancient times); dried; withered
8. to weed; to eradicate
9. see »píxiū«, composite mythical animal (originally was the female)
10. red lacquer; to lacquer

xiūshì /xiu1 shi4/*
1. to decorate; to adorn; to dress up; to polish (a written piece); to qualify or modify (grammar)
2. member of religious order; frater
3. to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)
xiūshì /xiu1 shi4/*
xiūshìzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to decorate; to adorn; to dress up; to polish (a written piece); to qualify or modify (grammar)
2. member of religious order; frater
3. to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)
xiūshì /xiu1 shi4/*
xiūshìguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to decorate; to adorn; to dress up; to polish (a written piece); to qualify or modify (grammar)
2. member of religious order; frater
3. to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)
xiūshì /xiu1 shi4/*
xiūshìle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. member of religious order; frater
3. to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)

xī /xi1/
1. west
2. to breathe; to suck in; to absorb; to inhale
3. (particle in old Chinese similar to )
4. to hope; to admire
5. laugh; giggle; (interjection expressing admiration, surprise etc)

11. rare; uncommon

13. (bound form) sth liquid or of thin consistency (as in »lǜdòuxī« "sweet mung bean soup")
14. (bound form) totally; extremely (used with negative attributes, as in »xīzāo« "utterly ruined")
15. to separate; to divide; to analyze
16. to extinguish; to put out (fire); to quench; to stop burning; to go out (of fire, lamp etc); to come to an end; to wither away; to die out; Taiwan pr. »xí«

Xī /Xi1/
1. the West; abbr. for Spain »Xībānyá«; Spanish
2. name of a river in Hubei
3. same as Fuxi »Fúxī«, a mythical emperor; surname Xi

xīn /xin1/
1. new; newly; meso- (chemistry)
2. heart; mind; intention; center; core; CL: kē, gè
3. (literary) firewood; fuel; (bound form) salary
4. (of taste) hot or pungent; hard; laborious; suffering; eighth in order; eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; ancient Chinese compass point: 285°; octa
5. zinc (chemistry)
6. (bound form) the pith of the rush plant (used as a lampwick)
7. fragrant
8. Kangxi radical 61 as a vertical side element
9. Asarum; Wild ginger; also »xìxīn«
10. (literary) to arrange in ordered fashion; also pr. »qīn«
11. happy
12. dawn
13. pleased; moved
14. mid-day glare; heat
15. pleased; delighted; happy
16. (used in names of people and shops, symbolizing prosperity)

2. to rise; to flourish; to become popular; to start; to encourage; to get up; (often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect); maybe (dialect)

4. (literary) to come to one's senses; to awaken
5. (literary) astute; sharp-witted
6. ape
7. horse (or cattle) of reddish color; bay horse
8. (literary) (of a fire) fierce; intense; blazing
9. (literary) to radiate light in all directions

4. stroke (of a piston)
5. (Tw) (computing) process
xíngchéng /xing2cheng2/

2. outer appearance; form; shape; formality
3. circumstances; situation; terrain
4. criminal; penal
5. type; pattern; version; style
xíngshì /xing2 shi4/*
xíngshìzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to execute; to handle; behavior; action; conduct
2. outer appearance; form; shape; formality
3. circumstances; situation; terrain
4. criminal; penal
5. type; pattern; version; style

xǐ /xi3/
1. to wash; to bathe; to develop (photographs); to shuffle (cards etc); to erase (a recording)
2. to be fond of; to like; to enjoy; to be happy; to feel pleased; happiness; delight; glad
3. slippers
4. ruler's seal
5. (literary) to change one's residence
6. double happiness (similar to ); symbol of good luck, esp. marriage
7. to mill (machining); Taiwan pr. »xiǎn«
8. to be at, in or on (Cantonese); Mandarin equivalent: »zài«
9. male nettle-hemp
10. joy
11. sieve; to sift, to strain
12. band for the hair
13. silk headband; Taiwan pr. »shǐ«
14. feel insecure; unhappy
15. (grass); increase five fold
16. (spider)
17. shoe; to step
18. seaborgium (chemistry)
xǐ /xi3/
xǐzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

xǐ /xi3/

xì /xi4/
1. trick; drama; play; show; CL: chū, chǎng, tái
2. to connect; to relate to; to tie up; to bind; to be (literary)
3. system; department; faculty
4. to connect; to arrest; to worry
5. thin or slender; finely particulate; thin and soft; fine; delicate; trifling; (of a sound) quiet; frugal
6. crack; crevice; gap or interval; loophole; discord; rift
7. to argue; to quarrel
8. to go; to walk
9. forty
10. to rest
11. loud laugh
12. sprightful
13. name of a river
14. saline land; salt marsh
15. to glare at
16. semiannual ceremony of purification
17. coarse hempen fabric
18. shoe; slipper
19. plantain (Plantago asiatica); common water-plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)
20. terrified
21. sad (old)
22. shame; disgrace
23. red; scarlet
24. place name
25. (arch.) metal horn attached as shield to horse or to the axle of a chariot
26. to engrave or carve, as a block for printing
27. grain ration; sacrificial victim

2. dramatic form consisting of historical narration; history as jocular narrative; to stretch history for a joking story; amusing story with strained interpretations of history; to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
xìshuō /xi4 shuo1/*
xìshuōguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

xuān /xuan1/
1. to declare (publicly); to announce
2. clamor; noise
3. pavilion with a view; high; tall; high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
4. (literary) ingenious; (literary) frivolous
5. well-being
6. to roll up one's sleeves; to slap with the palm
7. light of the sun; to dry in the sun
8. genial and warm
9. ornamental piece of jade
10. bamboo flower; flowering bamboo
11. flirtatious; short flight
12. orange day-lily (Hemerocallis flava)
13. a kind of smelly water plant
14. wriggler; mosquito larva; to crawl; to worm along
15. to deceive; to forget
16. usually used in a name; clever; intelligent
17. spade; hoe

xuán /xuan2/
1. to hang or suspend; to worry; public announcement; unresolved; baseless; without foundation
2. to revolve; a loop; a circle
3. black; mysterious
4. whirlpool; eddy; also pr. »xuàn«
5. also pr. »suì«
6. beautiful; fine
7. (literary) bright; (literary) beautiful; good-looking
8. jadelike precious stone; jade-colored
9. beautiful jade; star
10. (jade)
xuán /xuan2/
xuánzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

9. beautiful jade; star
10. (jade)

■ optional (equipment)
xuǎn biān zhàn /xuan3 bian1 zhan4/
■ to choose a side (in a conflict, debate or rivalry); to take sides
xuàn /xuan4/
1. to dazzle; to boast; to show off; (slang) cool; awesome
2. to whirl; immediately
3. (literary) dizzy; (literary) dazzled; bewildered; to dazzle
4. stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron; commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"
5. adorned; swift; gorgeous; brilliant; variegated
6. wash (color)
7. long day; extended; relaxed
8. (wooden) shoe last
9. to block (a hat); to stretch (a shoe)
10. weep
11. dazzled; dizzy
12. (herb)
13. (literary) to boast; to show off
14. to shape on a lathe; to peel with a knife; to turn in (a screw)
15. fine
16. gray

xuēzi /xue1 zi5/*

xuēzi luòdì /xue1zi5 luo4di4/
■ lit. the boot hits the floor (idiom); fig. a much-anticipated, impactful development has finally occurred (an allusion to a joke from the 1950s in which a young man would take off a boot and throw it onto the floor, waking the old man sleeping downstairs who could then not get back to sleep until he had heard the second boot hit the floor)
xuēzúshìlǚ /xue1 zu2 shi4 lu:3/*

xué /xue2/
1. to learn; to study; to imitate; science; -ology
2. cave; cavity; hole; acupuncture point; Taiwan pr. »xuè«
3. to grasp
4. big rocky mountain
5. to store grain by enclosing it in a woven mat rolled into a vertical cylinder
6. to polish horn
7. to walk around; turn back midway
8. various species of finch (old)

xuè /xue4/
1. blood; colloquial pr. »xiě«; CL: dī, piàn
2. joy; to joke; to banter; to tease; to mock; Taiwan pr. »nüè«
3. (archaic) to enter; to fly
xuè /xue4/
xuèzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. blood; colloquial pr. »xiě«; CL: dī, piàn
2. joy; to joke; to banter; to tease; to mock; Taiwan pr. »nüè«
3. (archaic) to enter; to fly
xuè /xue4/
xuèguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. blood; colloquial pr. »xiě«; CL: dī, piàn
2. joy; to joke; to banter; to tease; to mock; Taiwan pr. »nüè«
3. (archaic) to enter; to fly
xuè /xue4/
xuèle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. blood; colloquial pr. »xiě«; CL: dī, piàn
2. joy; to joke; to banter; to tease; to mock; Taiwan pr. »nüè«
3. (archaic) to enter; to fly

xū /xu1/
1. to exhale slowly; to hiss; hush!
2. to require; to need; to want; necessity; need
3. must; to have to; to wait
4. beard; mustache; feeler (of an insect etc); tassel
5. emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain
6. sh; hush
7. all; assist; to store
8. 11th earthly branch: 7-9 p.m., 9th solar month (8th October-6th November), year of the Dog; ancient Chinese compass point: 300°
9. breathe on; yawn; roar
10. (dialect) country fair; country market
11. ruins; (literary) village; country fair
12. (dialect) elder sister (old)
13. mistress, concubine; weak
14. dawn
15. (literary) to blow or breathe upon; happy
16. suddenly; also pr. »hū«
17. to snort
18. anxious; stare
19. sound of flaying
20. fine silk
21. multicolored silk; piece of silk torn in two, used to verify the holder's identity by matching up the two halves
22. to boast; great; large
23. (literary) ability and wisdom; scheme; stratagem
24. bolt of a Chinese lock
25. dim; dark; sudden; surreptitious; Taiwan pr. »xù«

Xúhuìqū /Xu2 hui4 qu1/*
■ Xuhui district, central Shanghai

■ Xujiahui, an area in »Xúhuìqū«, Xuhui district, central Shanghai
xún /xun2/
1. to search; to look for; to seek
2. to patrol; to make one's rounds; classifier for rounds of drinks
3. to follow; to adhere to; to abide by
4. to ask about; to inquire about
5. ten days; ten years; full period
6. sturgeon; Acipenser sturio
7. name of a feudal state
8. to tell
9. fathom (1.83 meters) (old)
10. sincere
11. cross bar
12. Fraxinus bungeana
13. truly; whirlpool
14. name of a river; steep bank
15. a group of springs
16. warm up (food)
17. (gem)
18. bind; silkcords
19. (archaic) name of a plant mentioned in ancient texts; name of a state that existed during the Zhou dynasty in present-day Shanxi
20. (hairy sea-crab)
xún /xun2/
xúnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

xún /xun2/

xǔ /xu3/
1. to allow; to permit; to promise; to praise; somewhat; perhaps
2. cap of Yin dynasty
3. to breathe upon
4. chatter like old woman; cheerful
5. used in »xǔxǔ«; jolcham oak (Quercus serrata)
6. abundant; bright; strain spirits
7. a kind of jade
8. official pay; sacrificial rice
9. to brag; popular; lovely
10. spiritus; strain spirits
xǔ /xu3/
xǔzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

xù /xu4/
1. anxiety; sympathy; to sympathize; to give relief; to compensate
2. to raise (animals)
3. to continue; to replenish
4. to store up; to grow (e.g. a beard); to entertain (ideas)
5. to narrate; to chat
6. (bound form) order; sequence
7. (bound form) introductory; initial
8. preface
9. son-in-law; husband
10. cotton wadding; fig. padding; long-winded
11. beginnings; clues; mental state; thread
12. dawn; rising sun
13. drunk
14. to foster; to bear
15. still; silent
16. exhort; stimulate
17. earthern goblet stand also known as »fǎndiàn« (old)
18. balmy; nicely warm; cozy
19. damage egg so it does not hatch
20. to ditch; a moat
21. name of a river
22. balmy; nicely warm; cozy; Taiwan pr. »xǔ«
23. (literary) (of birds) to scatter in fear; (literary) wild; unrestrained
24. Scirpis maritimus; small chestnut
25. clover; lucerne; Taiwan pr. »sù«
26. beautiful
27. Alisma plantago
28. to beguile with false stories
29. Hypophthalmichthys moritrix

xùn /xun4/
1. to abdicate; modest; yielding; unpretentious; inferior to; (slang) to suck
2. (bound form) to ask; to inquire
3. (bound form) to interrogate; to question
4. (bound form) news; information
5. to teach; to train; to admonish
6. (bound form) instruction (from superiors); teachings; rule
7. to attain gradually; to tame; Taiwan pr. »xún«
8. to be buried with the dead; to die for a cause
9. rapid; fast
10. mold; mushroom
11. high water; flood; to sprinkle water
12. (literary) quick
13. (archaic) to fly rapidly
14. spurt out of the mouth
15. to obey; one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing wood and wind; ☴; ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
16. to give in to; to be swayed by (personal considerations etc); Taiwan pr. »xún«; to follow; to expose publicly
17. to be the first to begin a quarrel

xùndú /xun4 du2/*
■ a reading of a written Chinese word derived from a synonym (typically, a vernacular synonym) (e.g. in Mandarin, »tóuzi« may be pronounced as its synonym »shǎizi«, and in Wu dialects, is pronounced as its synonym "liahn"); to pronounce a word using such a reading; (Japanese linguistics) kun-reading, a pronunciation of a kanji derived from a native Japanese word that matches its meaning rather than from the pronunciation of the character in a Sinitic language at the time it was imported from China (Note: A kun-reading of a character is distinguished from its on-reading(s) »yīndú«. For example, has a kun-reading "yama" and an on-reading "san".)
xùndú /xun4 du2/*
xùndúzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

For example, has a kun-reading "yama" and an on-reading "san".)
xùndú /xun4 du2/*
xùndúguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

For example, has a kun-reading "yama" and an on-reading "san".)
xùndú /xun4 du2/*
xùndúle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ a reading of a written Chinese word derived from a synonym (typically, a vernacular synonym) (e.g. in Mandarin, »tóuzi« may be pronounced as its synonym »shǎizi«, and in Wu dialects, is pronounced as its synonym "liahn"); to pronounce a word using such a reading; (Japanese linguistics) kun-reading, a pronunciation of a kanji derived from a native Japanese word that matches its meaning rather than from the pronunciation of the character in a Sinitic language at the time it was imported from China (Note: A kun-reading of a character is distinguished from its on-reading(s) »yīndú«. ■ one of three Ming dynasty sequels to Journey to the West
ya /ya5/
■ (particle equivalent to after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
yā /ya1/
1. ah (used to express surprise); (onom.) creaking
2. to press; to push down; to keep under (control); pressure
3. to mortgage; to pawn; to detain in custody; to escort and protect; (literary) to sign
4. duck; CL: zhī
5. (slang) male prostitute
6. fork; branch; bifurcation; girl
7. (onom.) sound of cawing; sound of infant learning to talk
8. crow
9. (dialect) strip of land between hills; used in place names; also pr. »yà«
10. forking branch
11. raging fire
yā /ya1/
yāzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

yā /ya1/

2. to press; to push down; to keep under (control); pressure
3. to mortgage; to pawn; to detain in custody; to escort and protect; (literary) to sign

■ to compel sb to obey; to force into submission; to subjugate
yāfú /ya1fu2/
yāfúguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to compel sb to obey; to force into submission; to subjugate
yāfú /ya1fu2/
yāfúle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to compel sb to obey; to force into submission; to subjugate

yān /yan1/
1. cigarette or pipe tobacco; CL: gēn
2. smoke
3. mist
4. vapour; CL: lǚ
5. tobacco plant
6. (of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
7. tobacco
8. throat; pharynx; narrow pass
9. to flood; to submerge; to drown; to irritate the skin (of liquids); to delay
10. to salt; to pickle; to cure (meat); to marinate
11. to castrate; a castrate; neuter
12. where; how
13. to castrate; to delay
14. dark red
15. correct; suitable; to suit sb; just now (Cantonese)
16. (literary) lovely; sweet
17. name of a mountain in Gansu
18. to flood
19. (literary) to sink into oblivion; (literary) to silt up; Taiwan pr. »yīn«
20. a kind of jade
21. black bamboo
22. rouge

Yān /Yan1/
1. Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in present-day Hebei and Liaoning; north Hebei; the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan »Qián Yān« (337-370), Later Yan »Hòu Yān« (384-409), Southern Yan »Nán Yān« (398-410), Northern Yan »Běi Yān« (409-436); surname Yan
2. name of an immortal; ancient place name; surname Yan
3. (archaic) river name
4. surname Yan; name of a district in Henan

■ (bird species of China) Asian house martin (Delichon dasypus)
yāng /yang1/
1. calamity
2. center; end; to beg; to plead
3. agitated (wind, cloud); boundless
4. sapling; seedling; sprout; (esp.) rice seedling
5. stem; stalk; vine
6. baby livestock; fry
7. (dialect) to raise; to cultivate (plants or animals)
8. the navel
9. (onom.) ring; tinkle
10. martingale (part of a horse's harness); used in »yāngyāng«

yānmò /yan1 mo4/*

2. to bury; to submerge; to pass into oblivion; to obliterate; to annihilate (physics)
yānmò /yan1 mo4/*
yānmòzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to submerge; to drown; to flood; to drown out (also fig.)
2. to bury; to submerge; to pass into oblivion; to obliterate; to annihilate (physics)
yānmò /yan1 mo4/*
yānmòguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to submerge; to drown; to flood; to drown out (also fig.)
2. to bury; to submerge; to pass into oblivion; to obliterate; to annihilate (physics)
yānmò /yan1 mo4/*
yānmòle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to submerge; to drown; to flood; to drown out (also fig.)
2. to bury; to submerge; to pass into oblivion; to obliterate; to annihilate (physics)

yāo /yao1/
1. (bound form) to demand; to coerce
2. to weigh in a balance or on a scale
3. the waist and lower back; (bound form) kidney of an animal (as food); the waist of trousers or a skirt; (metonym) money pouch; pocket; (bound form) the middle section of an upright object (mountain, bottle etc)
4. to invite; to request; to intercept; to solicit; to seek
5. goblin; witch; devil; bewitching; enchanting; monster; phantom; demon
6. (bound form) to die prematurely (also pr. »yǎo«); (literary) (of vegetation) luxuriant
7. (bound form) to die prematurely (also pr. »yǎo«)
8. to shout; to bawl; to yell (to urge on an animal); to hawk (one's wares)
9. youngest; most junior; tiny; one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military); one or ace on dice or dominoes
10. grasshopper chirp; mosquito buzz
11. evil spirit; goblin; witchcraft; common erroneous variant of »Xiān« Ormazda
12. Polygala japonica; lush (grass)

yáng /yang2/
1. sheep; goat; CL: tóu, zhī
2. positive (electric.); sun; male principle (Taoism); Yang, opposite: »yīn«
3. to raise; to hoist; the action of tossing or winnowing; scattering (in the wind); to flutter; to propagate
4. ocean; vast; foreign; silver dollar or coin
5. poplar
6. to feign; to pretend
7. ulcers; sores
8. clay sheep buried with the dead
9. to walk back and forth
10. rising sun; sunshine
11. molten; smelt
12. a weevil found in rice etc
13. ornaments on headstall of horse
14. to soar; to fly; to float; to spread

yáo /yao2/
1. to shake; to rock; to row; to crank
2. (bound form) distant; remote; far away
3. popular ballad; rumor
4. kiln; oven; coal pit; cave dwelling; (coll.) brothel
5. handsome; good-looking
6. jade; precious stone; mother-of-pearl; nacre; precious; used a complementary honorific
7. skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae); ray (fish)
8. meat dishes; mixed viands
9. (archaic) vase; pitcher
10. Yao tribe
11. embankment
12. high; steep; to tower
13. compulsory service
14. distressed, agitated
15. the solid and broken lines of the eight trigrams »bāguà«, e.g. ☶
16. mother-of-pearl
17. folk-song; forced labor
18. light carriage
19. weeding tool
20. floating in the air
yáo /yao2/

yáo /yao2/

13. compulsory service
14. distressed, agitated
15. the solid and broken lines of the eight trigrams »bāguà«, e.g. ☶
16. mother-of-pearl
17. folk-song; forced labor
18. light carriage
19. weeding tool
20. floating in the air
yáo /yao2/
yáole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to shake; to rock; to row; to crank
2. (bound form) distant; remote; far away
3. popular ballad; rumor
4. kiln; oven; coal pit; cave dwelling; (coll.) brothel
5. handsome; good-looking
6. jade; precious stone; mother-of-pearl; nacre; precious; used a complementary honorific
7. skate (cartilaginous fish belonging to the family Rajidae); ray (fish)
8. meat dishes; mixed viands
9. (archaic) vase; pitcher
10. Yao tribe
11. embankment
12. high; steep; to tower
13. compulsory service
14. distressed, agitated
15. the solid and broken lines of the eight trigrams »bāguà«, e.g. ☶
16. mother-of-pearl
17. folk-song; forced labor
18. light carriage
19. weeding tool
20. floating in the air
Yáo /Yao2/
1. Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia; surname Yao
2. surname Yao; Yao or Tang Yao (c. 2200 BC), one of the Five legendary Emperors »Wǔ Dì«, second son of Di Ku »Dì Kù«

yǎn /yan3/
1. eye; CL: zhī, shuāng
2. (often used with »yī«) a look; a glance
3. small hole
4. (bound form) salient point
5. classifier for wells, cave-dwellings etc
6. to perform (a play etc); to stage (a show)
7. (bound form) to develop; to play out; to carry out (a task)
8. to cover up; to conceal; to close (a door, book etc); (coll.) to get (one's fingers etc) caught when closing a door or lid; (literary) to launch a surprise attack
9. suddenly; abruptly; hastily; to cover; to surround
10. to spread out; to develop; to overflow; to amplify; superfluous
11. to lie supine; to stop; to fall down
12. majestic; dignified
13. sharp
14. to hide, to secrete, to repress; to bend
15. operculum (Latin: little lid); a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
16. the movement of a fish's mouth at the surface of the water

18. to cover; trap

20. upright bar for fastening a door

12. cry of hen pheasant
